}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== :;iWavePort WLM54GP30ESD
{{CompexEoL}}
==Links of Interest== [https://deviwiki.com/files/datasheets/compex/wlm54gp30esd.pdf Datasheet]
==Notes== ===Specifications from the datasheet=== Specifications, per the datasheet, follow.. *RF ESD/EMP immunity Threshold: 15KeV *uses MMCX connectors, 30dBm max output *TX Output Power (all +1.0/-1.5 dB) **802.11b, 1-11Mbps, 30 dBm **802.11g, 6-24Mbps, 30 dBm **802.11g, 36Mbps, 28 dBm **802.11g, 48Mbps, 27 dBm **802.11g, 54Mbps, 25 dBm *Receiver Sensitivity (all +-2 dB) **802.11b ***-96 dBm @ 1Mbps ***-93 dBm @ 2Mbps ***-91 dBm @ 5.5 Mbps ***-90 dBm @ 11Mbps **802.11g ***-93 dBm @ 6Mbps ***-90 dBm @ 9Mbps ***-89 dBm @ 12Mbps ***-87 dBm @ 18Mbps ***-84 dBm @ 24Mbps ***-80 dBm @ 36Mbps ***-76 dBm @ 48Mbps ***-74 dBm @ 54Mbps *There are AR2413 and AR2414 models of this device
[[Category:English Documentation]]
